member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.AssemblyInfoTask
member.summary: Generates an AssemblyInfo file using the attributes given.

example.para: Create a C# AssemblyInfo file containing the specified assembly-level attributes.
example.code: <asminfo output="AssemblyInfo.cs" language="CSharp"> <imports> <import name="System" /> <import name="System.Reflection" /> <import name="System.EnterpriseServices" /> <import name="System.Runtime.InteropServices" /> </imports> <attributes> <attribute type="ComVisibleAttribute" value="false" /> <attribute type="CLSCompliantAttribute" value="true" /> <attribute type="AssemblyVersionAttribute" value="1.0.0.0" /> <attribute type="AssemblyTitleAttribute" value="My fun assembly" /> <attribute type="AssemblyDescriptionAttribute" value="More fun than a barrel of monkeys" /> <attribute type="AssemblyCopyrightAttribute" value="Copyright (c) 2002, Monkeyboy, Inc." /> <attribute type="ApplicationNameAttribute" value="FunAssembly" /> </attributes> <references> <includes name="System.EnterpriseServices.dll" /> </references> </asminfo>

example.para: Create a C# AssemblyInfo file containing an attribute with multiple named properties by setting the attribute on the element to .
example.code: <asminfo output="AssemblyInfo.cs" language="CSharp"> <imports> <import name="log4net.Config" /> </imports> <attributes> <attribute type="DOMConfiguratorAttribute" value="ConfigFile="config.log4net",Watch=true" asis="true" /> </attributes> <references> <includes name="log4net.dll" /> </references> </asminfo>

member.summary: Obtains a lifetime service object to control the lifetime policy for this instance.

member.name: M:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.AssemblyInfoTask.TypedValueGatherer.GetTypedValue(System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection,System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the specified corresponding with the specified type name from a list of assemblies.
member.param: The collection of assemblies that the type should tried to be instantiated from.
The list of imports that can be used to resolve the typename to a full typename.
The typename that should be used to determine the type to which the specified value should be converted.
The value that should be converted to a typed value.

exception.para: is and the identified by has no default public constructor.
cannot be converted to a value that's suitable for one of the constructors of the identified by .
The identified by has no suitable constructor.
A identified by could not be located or loaded.

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.AssemblyLinkerTask
member.summary: Wraps al.exe, the assembly linker for the .NET Framework.

remarks.para: All specified sources will be embedded using the /embed flag. Other source types are not supported.

example.para: Create a library containing all icon files in the current directory.

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase

member.name: F:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase.CodebehindExtensions
member.summary: Contains a list of extensions for all file types that should be treated as 'code-behind' when looking for resources. Ultimately this will determine if we use the "namespace+filename" or "namespace+classname" algorithm, since code-behind will use the "namespace+classname" algorithm.

member.summary: Generate debug output. The default is .

member.summary: Define conditional compilation symbol(s).

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase.Win32Icon
member.summary: Icon to associate with the application.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase.WarnAsError
member.summary: Instructs the compiler to treat all warnings as errors. The default is .

remarks.para: Corresponds to the /warnaserror[+|-] flag of the compiler.
When this property is set to , any messages that would ordinarily be reported as warnings will instead be reported as errors.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase.ForceRebuild
member.summary: Instructs NAnt to recompile the output file regardless of the file timestamps.
member.remarks: When this parameter is to , NAnt will always run the compiler to rebuild the output file, regardless of the file timestamps.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase.MainType
member.summary: Specifies which type contains the Main method that you want to use as the entry point into the program.

remarks.para: Corresponds to the /m[ain]: flag of the compiler.
Use this property when creating an executable file. If this property is not set, the compiler searches for a valid Main method in all public classes.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase.Lib
member.summary: Additional directories to search in for assembly references.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase.References
member.summary: Reference metadata from the specified assembly files.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CompilerBase.ResourcesList
member.summary: Resources to embed.

remarks.para: This can be a combination of resx files and file resources.
.resx files will be compiled by and then embedded into the resulting executable.
The property is used to make up the resource name added to the assembly manifest for non-resx files.
For .resx files the namespace from the matching source file is used as prefix. This matches the behaviour of Visual Studio.
Multiple resources tags with different namespace prefixes may be specified.

member.remarks: This address can be specified as a decimal, hexadecimal, or octal number.

member.summary: Instructs the compiler not to use implicit references to assemblies. The default is .

member.summary: Specifies whether an integer arithmetic statement that is not in the scope of the checked or unchecked keywords and that results in a value outside the range of the data type should cause a run-time exception. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.CscTask.Unsafe
member.summary: Instructs the compiler to allow code that uses the unsafe keyword. The default is .

member.summary: Specifies whether the compiler should perform optimizations to the make output files smaller, faster, and more effecient. The default is .

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.DelaySignTask
member.summary: Signs delay-signed .NET Assemblies, or re-signs existing assemblies.

remarks.para: The delay-signing mechanism takes a fileset (named targets) and either a attribute for a file containing the public and private keys, or to name a key container.

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.NDocTask
member.summary: Runs NDoc to create documentation.

remarks.para: See the NDoc home page for more information.

example.para: Document two assemblies using the MSDN documenter. The namespaces are documented in NamespaceSummary.xml.
example.code: <ndoc> <assemblies basedir="${build.dir}"> <includes name="NAnt.exe" /> <includes name="NAnt.Core.dll" /> </assemblies> <summaries basedir="${build.dir}"> <includes name="NamespaceSummary.xml" /> </summaries> <documenters> <documenter name="MSDN"> <property name="OutputDirectory" value="doc\MSDN" /> <property name="HtmlHelpName" value="NAnt" /> <property name="HtmlHelpCompilerFilename" value="hhc.exe" /> <property name="IncludeFavorites" value="False" /> <property name="Title" value="An NDoc Documented Class Library" /> <property name="SplitTOCs" value="False" /> <property name="DefaulTOC" value="" /> <property name="ShowVisualBasic" value="True" /> <property name="ShowMissingSummaries" value="True" /> <property name="ShowMissingRemarks" value="True" /> <property name="ShowMissingParams" value="True" /> <property name="ShowMissingReturns" value="True" /> <property name="ShowMissingValues" value="True" /> <property name="DocumentInternals" value="False" /> <property name="DocumentProtected" value="True" /> <property name="DocumentPrivates" value="False" /> <property name="DocumentEmptyNamespaces" value="False" /> <property name="IncludeAssemblyVersion" value="False" /> <property name="CopyrightText" value="" /> <property name="CopyrightHref" value="" /> </documenter> </documenters> </ndoc>
example.para: Content of NamespaceSummary.xml :
example.code: The Foo.Bar namespace reinvents the wheel. The Foo.Bar.Tests namespace ensures that the Foo.Bar namespace reinvents the wheel correctly.

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.RegsvcsTask
member.summary: Installs or removes .NET Services.

remarks.para: This tasks provides the same functionality as the regsvcs tool provided in the .NET SDK.

item.description: Generates, registers, and installs a type library into a specified COM+ application.
Configures services that are added programmatically to your class.

remarks.para: Refer to the .NET Services Installation Tool (Regsvcs.exe) for more information.

example.para: Adds all public classes contained in myTest.dll to a COM+ application and produces the myTest.tlb type library. If the application already exists, it is overwritten.
Adds all public classes contained in myTest.dll to myTargetApp and produces the myTest.tlb type library. If the application already exists, it is overwritten.
Adds all public classes contained in myTest.dll to a COM+ application and produces the myTest.tlb type library. A new application is always created.
Uninstalls the COM+ application contained in myTest.dll

member.name: M:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.RegsvcsTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Performs the specified action.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.RegsvcsTask.Action
member.summary: Defines the action to take with the assembly. Supported actions are: (the default), , or .

member.summary: The source assembly file.
member.remarks: The assembly must be signed with a strong name.

member.summary: Specifies the type library file to install.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.RegsvcsTask.ExistingTypeLibrary
member.summary: Uses an existing type library. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.RegsvcsTask.NoReconfig
member.summary: Do not reconfigure an existing target application. The default is .

member.summary: Configures components only; ignores methods and interfaces. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.RegsvcsTask.ExistingApplication
member.summary: Expect an existing application. The default is .

member.summary: Specifies the name of the COM+ application to either find or create.

member.summary: Specifies the name or id of the COM+ application to either find or create.

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.ResGenTask

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VbcTask
member.summary: Compiles Visual Basic.NET programs.

example.para: Example build file using this task.
example.code: <project name="Hello World" default="build" basedir="."> <property name="basename" value="HelloWorld" /> <property name="debug" value="true" /> <target name="clean"> <delete file="${basename}-vb.exe" failonerror="false" /> <delete file="${basename}-vb.pdb" failonerror="false" /> </target> <target name="build"> <vbc target="exe" output="${basename}-vb.exe"> <sources> <includes name="${basename}.vb" /> </sources> </vbc> </target> <target name="debug" depends="clean"> <vbc target="exe" output="${basename}-vb.exe" debug="${debug}"> <sources> <includes name="${basename}.vb" /> </sources> </vbc> </target> </project>

member.name: M:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VbcTask.GetResourceLinkage(System.String,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Finds the correct namespace/classname for a resource file from the given dependent source file, and ensure the is prefixed.
member.param: The file from which the resource linkage of the resource file should be determined.
The culture of the resource file for which the resource linkage should be determined.
member.returns: The namespace/classname of the source file matching the resource or if the dependent source file does not exist.

member.name: M:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VbcTask.WriteOptions(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Writes the compiler options to the specified .
member.param: to which the compiler options should be written.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VbcTask.BaseAddress
member.summary: The preferred base address at which to load a DLL. The default base address for a DLL is set by the .NET Framework common language runtime.
member.value: The preferred base address at which to load a DLL.
member.remarks: This address must be specified as a hexadecimal number.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VbcTask.Imports
member.summary: Specifies whether the /imports option gets passed to the compiler.
member.value: The value of this attribute is a string that contains one or more namespaces separated by commas.

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.example: Example of an imports attribute imports="Microsoft.VisualBasic, System, System.Collections, System.Data, System.Diagnostics"

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VbcTask.OptionCompare
member.summary: Specifies whether /optioncompare option gets passed to the compiler.
member.value: text, binary, or an empty string. If the value is or an empty string, the option will not be passed to the compiler.

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.summary: Specifies whether the /optionstrict option gets passed to the compiler. The default is .

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VbcTask.RemoveIntChecks
member.summary: Specifies whether the /removeintchecks option gets passed to the compiler. The default is .
member.value: if the option should be passed to the compiler; otherwise, .

remarks.a: See the Microsoft.NET Framework SDK documentation for details.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VbcTask.RootNamespace
member.summary: Specifies whether the /rootnamespace option gets passed to the compiler.

member.name: T:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask
member.summary: Compiles Visual J# programs using vjc, Microsoft's J# compiler.

example.para: Compile helloworld.jsl to helloworld.exe.

member.name: M:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.WriteOptions(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Writes the compiler options to the specified .
member.param: to which the compiler options should be written.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.BaseAddress
member.summary: The preferred base address at which to load a DLL. The default base address for a DLL is set by the .NET Framework common language runtime.
member.value: The preferred base address at which to load a DLL.
member.remarks: This address can be specified as a decimal, hexadecimal, or octal number.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.SecureScoping
member.summary: Specifies whether package-scoped members are accessible outside of the assembly. In other words, package scope is treated as assembly scope when emitting metadata. The default is .
member.value: if the option should be passed to the compiler; otherwise, .

para.a: See the Visual J# Reference for details.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.X
member.summary: Specifies whether to disable language extensions.
member.value: The value of this property must be either all, net, or an empty string.

para.a: See the Visual J# Reference for details.

example.para: To disable only the .NET Framework extensions: <vjc x='net'/>
To disable the .NET Framework extensions and the VJ++ 6.0 extensions: <vjc x='all'/>

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.LibPath
member.summary: Specifies the location of assemblies referenced by way of the /reference flag.

para.a: See the Visual J# Reference for details.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.Jcpa
member.summary: Associate Java-language/COM package names.
member.value: The value of this propery. must be package=namespace, @filename, or an empty string.

para.a: See the Visual J# Reference for details.

example.para: Map package 'x' to namespace 'y': <vjc jcpa='x=y'/>

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.Codepage
member.summary: Specifies the code page to use for all source code files in the compilation.

para.a: See the Visual J# Reference for details.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.WarningLevel
member.summary: Specifies the warning level for the compiler to display. Valid values are 0-4. The default is 4.
member.value: The warning level for the compiler to display.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.NoWarn
member.summary: Specifies a comma-separated list of warnings that should be suppressed by the compiler.
member.value: Comma-separated list of warnings that should be suppressed by the compiler.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.Extension
member.summary: Gets the file extension required by the current compiler.
member.value: For the J# compiler, the file extension is always jsl.

member.name: P:NAnt.DotNet.Tasks.VjcTask.ClassNameRegex
member.summary: Gets the class name regular expression for the language of the current compiler.
member.value: Class name regular expression for the language of the current compiler.

member.summary: Gets the namespace regular expression for the language of the current compiler.
